deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.description: Deposit tokens to start earning yield.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Convert shares back to LTBC on Neutron mainnet.

depositInProgress.title: Your Funds are Working
depositInProgress.description: Valence automatically bridges your USDC from Ethereum mainnet to Neutron via IBC Eureka, deposits to an Astroport liquidity position, and earns yield until you initiate a withdrawal.

withdrawInProgress.title: Withdraw in Progress
withdrawInProgress.description: Your vault shares are being transferred to your Neutron account. This may take a few minutes.

withdrawCompleted.title: Withdraw Completed
withdrawCompleted.description: Your funds have been transferred to your Neutron account.
